revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Burned Tower |image = [[File:Burned Tower.png]] |caption = An outside view of Burned Tower. |tokens = 4,500 |location = Northwest of Ecruteak City. }} '''Burned Tower''' is a [[dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 88,500 |- | Golbat (Boss) || 320,000 |- | Weezing (Boss) || 320,000 |- | Shuckle (Boss) || 610,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Rattata * Zubat * Koffing * Raticate * Golbat (boss) * Weezing (boss) * Shuckle (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 33% |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 33% |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Incense}} [[Lucky Incense]] || 33% |}
[[Category:Dungeons]]
